TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Project extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含設計階段語意的專案。

span.span: Represents a project with design time semantics.

summary.span: 這個類別可以載入專案檔、編輯項目和屬性，以及建置專案。

span.span: This class can load project files, edit items and properties and build projects.

summary.span: 使用全域專案集合全域屬性和預設工具版本建構空的專案。

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用全域專案集合全域屬性和預設工具版本建構空的專案。

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案加入全域專案集合，它由提供時的完整路徑到來源專案檔中，通常在儲存專案。This project is added to the global project collection when it is given the full path to the source project file, typically by saving the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement xml) cil managed

param.name: xml
param.span: 要用於評估的 ProjectRootElement。

span.span: ProjectRootElement to use for evaluation.

summary.span: 使用指定的專案根項目及全域專案集合全域屬性和預設工具版本，建構空的專案並加以評估。

span.span: Constructs an empty project and evaluates it using the given project root and the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案或給定的專案根目錄提供給來源專案檔的完整路徑時，專案會加入全域專案集合。This project is added to the global project collection when either this project or the given project root is given the full path to the source project file. 在評估失敗時，會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已經有相同的專案，則會擲回 InvalidOperationException 載入專案集合中。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的專案集合全域屬性和預設工具版本建構空的專案。

span.span: Constructs an empty project using the given project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個專案加入至指定的專案集合中，它由提供時的完整路徑到來源專案檔中，通常在儲存專案。This project is added to the given project collection when it is given the full path to the source project file, typically by saving the project.

span.span: Constructs a project and evaluates it from the given source project file and with the global project collection global properties and default tools version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 專案會加入至全域專案集合。The project is added to the global project collection. 如果評估此來源專案檔的專案集合中已經有專案，就會擲回 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already a project in the project collection that evaluates this source project file. 可能會擲回與 IO 相關例外狀況。May throw IO-related exceptions.

span.span: If the evaluation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 專案會加入至指定的專案集合。The project is added to the given project collection. 在評估失敗時，會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails. 如果已經有相同的專案，則會擲回 InvalidOperationException 載入專案集合中。Throws InvalidOperationException if there is already an equivalent project loaded in the project collection. 可能會擲回與 IO 相關例外狀況。May throw IO-related exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以稍後新增的任何中繼資料。Any metadata can be added later. 如果萬用字元運算式已包含新的項目，則不會修改專案來源。Does not modify the project source if a wildcard expression already includes the new item. 評估會以最佳的方式進行。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 新的項目後面的專案來源中定義的項目可用於評估。Items that are defined in the project source following the new item may be used for evaluation. 此項目會加以評估。Only this item is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他項目。Other items that might depend on it are not affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將項目附加至第一個項目群組或不需要條件，而且沒有子系的第一個子系是相同類型的項目。Appends the item to the first item group that does not have a condition and has either no children or whose first child is an item of the same type. 評估以最佳方式為基礎:-展開所有項目。Evaluates on a best-effort basis: -expands with all items. 可能會使用新的項目底下的 XML 中所定義的項目，即使在實際評估它們不會。Items that are defined in the XML below the new item may be used, even though in a real evaluation they would not be. 此項目會加以評估。Only this item is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他項目。Other items that might depend on it are not affected. 這是方便會辨識並不一定會保留本身完全一致的狀態中的專案重新評估之前。This is a convenience that it is understood does not necessarily leave the project in a perfectly self consistent state until reevaluation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllEvaluatedItemDefinitionMetadata As ICollection(Of ProjectMetadata)

summary.span: 取得在評估期間遇到的所有項目定義中繼資料。

span.span: Gets all item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 傳回在評估期間遇到的所有項目定義中繼資料。

span.span: Returns all item definition metadata encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 這不包含其條件未評估為 true 的任何項目 (Element)，也不包含在上次評估以後加入的任何項目 (Item) 定義中繼資料。

span.span: This does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor any item definition metadata added since the last evaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目中繼資料會在第二個評估行程中讀取。Item metadata is read during the second evaluation pass. 不同於 ItemDefinitions 屬性所傳回的中繼資料，這個中繼資料會經過排序，並包含任何後續覆寫具有相同名稱和項目類型的中繼資料。Unlike metadata returned by the ItemDefinitions property, this metadata is ordered, and includes any metadata subsequently overridden with the same name and item type.

value.span: 這些項目會在第三回評估期間進行讀取。

span.span: These are read during the third evaluation pass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於這些項目屬性所傳回的項目，這些排序相同的項目類型的項目不只被排序的評估期間發生的其他所有項目。Unlike those items returned by the Items property, these are ordered with respect to all other items encountered during evaluation, not just ordered with respect to items of the same item type. 在某些應用程式中，順序會很可觀，這個完整相互和這類主機可以使用這個屬性。In some applications, this complete mutual ordering is significant, and such hosts can use this property. 列舉型別不包含任何項目，其條件不是評估為 true，也不會包含自從上次評估後，新增任何項目。The enumeration does not include any elements whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor does it include any items added since the last evaluation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllEvaluatedProperties As ICollection(Of ProjectProperty)

summary.span: 取得在評估期間遇到的所有屬性。

span.span: Gets all properties encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 傳回在評估期間遇到的所有屬性。

span.span: Returns all properties encountered during evaluation.

value.span: 這不包含其條件未評估為 true 的任何屬性，也不包含在上次評估以後加入的任何屬性。

span.span: This does not include any properties whose conditions did not evaluate to true, nor any properties added since the last evaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些屬性會在第一次評估傳遞期間讀取。These properties are read during the first evaluation pass. 像內容屬性所傳回的屬性，這些會經過排序，並包含任何後續覆寫具有相同名稱的屬性。Unlike properties returned by the Properties property, these are ordered, and includes any properties subsequently overridden with the same name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConditionedProperties As IDictionary(Of String, List(Of String))

summary.span: 針對要用於評估在屬性、屬性群組、匯入和 When 上找到之條件的屬性，取得可能的屬性值集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 針對要用於評估在屬性、屬性群組、匯入和 When 上找到之條件的屬性，傳回可能的屬性值集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of possible property values for properties used to evaluate conditions found on properties, property groups, imports, and whens.

value.span: 此集合為標準格式。

span.span: The collection is in canonical form.

value.span: 輸入項目的名稱就是要評估之屬性的名稱，而其值則是可能屬性值的清單。

span.span: The name of the entry is the name of the property to be evaluated, and the value is a list of possible property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比方說，如果下列條件存在專案中的屬性： condition|$(Platform)' = = '偵錯|x 86'"condition' = = '版本' 」 資料表中會填入 {"Configuration"，{"偵錯 」，[發行]}} {「 平台 」，{"x86"}} 此集合可由 Visual Studio 來判斷專案中定義的設定For example, if the following conditions existed on properties in a project: Condition="'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)' == 'Debug|x86'" Condition="'$(Configuration)' == 'Release'" the table would be populated with { "Configuration", { "Debug", "Release" }} { "Platform", { "x86" }} This collection is used by Visual Studio to determine the configurations defined in the project

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MarkDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個專案標記為已修改。

span.span: Marks this project as modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很少需要明確地呼叫這個方法，因為所有的編輯作業會影響專案會自動將它標示為已修改。It is seldom necessary to call this method explicitly, because all edits affecting a project automatically mark it as modified. 有時候，不過，這個方法必須呼叫。Sometimes, however, this method must be called. 例如，專案可能有其條件取決於磁碟存在的檔案匯入項目。For example, a project may have an Import element whose condition depends on a file that exists on a disk. 如果該檔案不存在於評估時間，而且它建立評估後，則專案必須明確標示為已修改。If that file does not exist at evaluation time, and it is created after evaluation, then the project must be explicitly marked as modified. 方法使用這個屬性來判斷是否需要評估。The method uses this property to determine if an evaluation is necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當它標示為已修改，則會重新評估專案。The project is reevaluated only if it is marked as modified. 重新評估加入了對專案原始程式碼的所有變更。Reevaluation incorporates all changes made to the project source code. 在評估失敗時，會擲回 InvalidProjectFileException。Throws InvalidProjectFileException if the evaluation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveItem(class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectItem item) cil managed
Public Function RemoveItem (item As ProjectItem) As Boolean

param.name: item
param.span: 要移除的項目。

span.span: The item to be removed.

summary.span: 從專案中移除項目。

span.span: Removes an item from the project.

summary.span: 要移除的項目必須存在於專案中，而且不得源自已匯入的檔案。

span.span: The item to be removed must be present in the project, and must not originate from an imported file.

returns.span: 如果項目已存在於這個已評估的專案中，則傳回 true，否則傳回 false。

span.span: Returns true if the item is present in this evaluated project; otherwise false.

returns.span: 這個方法通常會傳回 true，因為如果要求的項目不存在，此方法會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Normally this method returns true, since if the requested item is not present, the method throws an exception.

returns.span: 如果項目只存在於 ItemsIgnoringCondition 集合中，則此方法會傳回 false。

span.span: If the item is present only in the ItemsIgnoringCondition collection, however, the method returns false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目群組中包含的項目會變成空白，也會移除它。If the item group containing the item becomes empty, it is also removed. 如果項目來自於萬用字元或以分號分隔的運算式，運算式會先展開成多個項目。If the item originates from a wildcard or semicolon-separated expression, the expression is first expanded into multiple items. 已更新專案，但沒有進一步的評估重新評估之前，就會發生。The project is updated, but no further evaluation occurs until reevaluation. 比方說，如果項目就會移除型別"i"，"j"評估從"@(i) 」 未修改，直到重新評估。For example, if an item of type "i" is removed, "j" which is evaluated from "@(i)" is not modified until reevaluation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有具有指定名稱的屬性，最後一個現有的屬性具有指定名稱本身或其屬性群組，在沒有條件，除非更新來自於匯入的檔案。If there is no property with the given name, updates the last existing property with the given name that has no condition on itself or its property group, unless it originated in an imported file. 第一個屬性群組中沒有條件，最後一個現有屬性群組之後，其他專案的開頭建立屬性群組如有必要，否則將新的屬性。Otherwise, adds a new property in the first property group without a condition, creating a property group if necessary after the last existing property group, else at the start of the project. 評估會以最佳的方式進行。Evaluation takes place on a best-effort basis. 下列新的屬性專案來源中定義的屬性可用於評估。Properties that are defined in the project source following the new property may be used for evaluation. 會評估這個屬性。Only this property is evaluated. 不會影響可能依賴其他屬性。Other properties that might depend on it are not affected.
